appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

textSearchNameHint.message: Give this search a friendly name.
textSearchNameHint.description: The hint of search name field.

searchModalNewTitle.description: The title of the new search modal.

searchModalEditTitle.description: The title of the edit search modal.

searchModalReplaceTitle.description: The title of the replace search modal.

searchModalReplaceHint.message: Select an existing search to update its details with the current search.
searchModalReplaceHint.description: The hint for replacing a saved search.

searchName.description: The label for the search name input field.

searchKeywords.description: The label for the search keywords display block.

searchItemOpen.message: Click to open the search URL
searchItemOpen.description: The label for the search item open link.

searchSavedSuccess.description: Success message when a search is saved.

searchDeletedSuccess.description: Success message when a search is deleted.

tooltipTrashButton.description: Tooltip for the trash button in the popup header.
